# Generated by tmake at 00:20, 2003/09/16
#     Project: hello.pro
#    Template: app

####### Compiler, tools and options

CC	=	gcc
CXX	=	g++
CFLAGS	=	-pipe -Wall -W -O2 -DNO_DEBUG
CXXFLAGS=	-pipe -Wall -W -O2 -DNO_DEBUG
INCPATH	=	-I$(QTDIR)/include
LINK	=	g++
LFLAGS	=	
LIBS	=	-L$(QTDIR)/lib -L/usr/X11R6/lib $(SUBLIBS)  -lqt -lXext -lX11 -lm
MOC	=	$(QTDIR)/bin/moc
UIC	=	$(QTDIR)/bin/uic
REMOVE	=	rm -f
TAR	=	tar -cf
GZIP	=	gzip -9f

####### Files

HEADERS =	hello.h
SOURCES =	hello.cpp \
		main.cpp
OBJECTS =	hello.o \
		main.o
INTERFACES =	
UICDECLS =	
UICIMPLS =	
SRCMOC	=	moc_hello.cpp
OBJMOC	=	moc_hello.o
DIST	=	
TARGET	=	hello
INTERFACE_DECL_PATH = .

####### Implicit rules

.SUFFIXES: .cpp .cxx .cc .C .c

.cpp.o:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o $@ $<

.cxx.o:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o $@ $<

.cc.o:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o $@ $<

.C.o:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o $@ $<

.c.o:
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o $@ $<

####### Build rules


all: $(TARGET)

$(TARGET): $(UICDECLS) $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC) 
	$(REMOVE) $(TARGET) 
	$(LINK) $(LFLAGS) -o $(TARGET) $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC) $(LIBS)

moc: $(SRCMOC)

tmake:
	tmake hello.pro

dist:
	$(REMOVE) Makefile  *.kdevprj *.kdevses

clean:
	$(REMOVE) $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC) $(SRCMOC) $(UICIMPLS) $(UICDECLS) $(TARGET)
	$(REMOVE) core *~



####### Compile

hello.o: hello.cpp \
		hello.h

main.o: main.cpp \
		hello.h

moc_hello.o: moc_hello.cpp \
		hello.h

moc_hello.cpp: hello.h
	$(MOC) hello.h -o moc_hello.cpp
